dependencies.description:
GNU Make is a tool which controls the generation of executables and
other non-source files of a program from the program's source files.
dependencies.name: gmake

dependencies.description:
Perl 5 is a highly capable, feature-rich programming language with over
27 years of development.
dependencies.name: perl

dependencies.description: Load URI::Escape::XS preferentially over URI::Escape
dependencies.name: perl-any-uri-escape

dependencies.description: Makes Perl's global destruction less tricky to deal with
dependencies.name: perl-devel-globaldestruction

dependencies.description: HTTP style message (base class)
dependencies.name: perl-http-message

dependencies.description: SSL sockets with IO::Socket interface
dependencies.name: perl-io-socket-ssl

dependencies.description: Use Cpanel::JSON::XS with a fallback to JSON::XS and JSON::PP
dependencies.name: perl-json-maybexs

dependencies.description:
The libwww-perl collection is a set of Perl modules which provides a
simple and consistent application programming interface to the World-
Wide Web. The main focus of the library is to provide classes and
functions that allow you to write WWW clients.
dependencies.name: perl-libwww-perl

dependencies.description: Bringing loggers and listeners together
dependencies.name: perl-log-any

dependencies.description: Send Log::Any logs to a subroutine
dependencies.name: perl-log-any-adapter-callback

dependencies.description: Runtime module handling
dependencies.name: perl-module-runtime

dependencies.description: Moo - Minimalist Object Orientation (with Moose compatibility)
dependencies.name: perl-moo

dependencies.description: Keep imports and functions out of your namespace.
dependencies.name: perl-namespace-clean

dependencies.description: Perl extension for manipulating IPv4/IPv6 addresses
dependencies.name: perl-net-ip

dependencies.description: Routines for manipulating stashes
dependencies.name: perl-package-stash

dependencies.description: A sophisticated exporter for custom-built routines
dependencies.name: perl-sub-exporter

dependencies.description: Extremely flexible deep comparison
dependencies.name: perl-test-deep

dependencies.description: Test exception-based code
dependencies.name: perl-test-exception

dependencies.description: Check for POD errors in files
dependencies.name: perl-test-pod

dependencies.description: Fork test
dependencies.name: perl-test-sharedfork

dependencies.description: Minimal try/catch with proper preservation of $@
dependencies.name: perl-try-tiny

dependencies.description: Uniform Resource Identifiers (absolute and relative)
dependencies.name: perl-uri

variants.description: Build systems supported by the package
variants.name: build_system
